actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Exchanges, Energy, and Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commodity Exchanges, Energy, and Credit

official_title: To help end-users better utilize derivatives markets by refining the definition of financial entity, clarifying how affiliates can utilize the end-user exception, and harmonizing clearing and margin exemptions.

summary.text:
Certainty for End-Users Act

This bill revises provisions regarding exemptions to the clearing requirement for commodity swaps, also known as the end-user exception. Among other things, the bill addresses qualifying financial entities, risk management activities of affiliated nonfinancial entities, margin requirements for certain insurance companies, and major swap participants.

titles.title: To help end-users better utilize derivatives markets by refining the definition of financial entity, clarifying how affiliates can utilize the end-user exception, and harmonizing clearing and margin exemptions.
